website_summaries.verdict: Essentia's line of alkaline water is on the expensive side, but many find it better in flavor than spring water and easier on their digestive systems than tap water. We recommend it for better rehydration after exercise.
pros: Very satisfying and easy on the stomach
Effective against heartburn, IBS and acid reflux
Many users report improvement in skin conditions, such as acne
cons: pH level may be lower than advertised
Taste and quality can be variable

customer_reviews.title: Not Essentia; Water is Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: I love Essentia water, my favorite and have been drinking for awhile now. Thought this was a great deal as this water is more expensive than others in the store. This is my second order of this water. The first order was great and taste like Essentia. The second order is definitely not Essentia and taste like unclean tap water. I should have been suspicious as the package labeling was a little off. I surely hope this vendor is not poisoning people. I have poured out all bottles and requested a refund. BTW, you will not receive a full refund. I only received $7 back.
customer_reviews.author: Kim H

customer_reviews.title: Do not Use this Seller!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this from this seller, it is 12 tiny bottles for $24.99. I would have gotten 10 large bottles for that price. Lesson Learned. Only get 1 star because it is the brand of water I requested.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Austin

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and leaking
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box bottles where everywhere and leaking water!!!!!! Just look at the pictures The outside of the box was perfect but inside was disaster!!! So that tells me whomever packed these did a lousy job !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: farhad tahan

customer_reviews.title: difficult to open
customer_reviews.text: I love Essential water but the small bottles are difficult to open and spill water at first try. I prefer the big bottles and won't reorder this size.
customer_reviews.author: bookie

customer_reviews.title: This water is the best!
customer_reviews.text: After drinking this water I can never go back to tap water, it is simply amazing and tastes great. This price is also decent (if it stays at $1 a bottle) as in the store its always $1.50-$2 a bottle. Will buy again as long as the price stays consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great, but watch the overflow
customer_reviews.text: This water is really good and has in it what it says. I would've given this 5 stars, but when you open the 12 oz bottles, they are so full that water inevitably ends up down your chin and on your shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Shilly

customer_reviews.title: PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Price, Price,Price, Great Water. I have purchase this product for a few years. First time I saw the gauging from a company. Shop around is my advice. For the company be comparable in price somewhat, please, you'd probably have more customers, myself as one this great water. Thanks for Listening! PS especially during this Covid 19, have a heart and make money.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Kim

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE: TINY BOTTLES! Definitely not worth the price! I rushed and ordered and didn’t read the size. You cannot return this either.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole T.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant taste, no after taste
customer_reviews.text: I don't like water. This is the only water I will consistently drink. Nice flavor. Doesn't taste like soap, metal, or plastic to me.
customer_reviews.author: onlineShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great size...
customer_reviews.text: I love this water... It's a lifesaver, and I love that AMAZON, Brings it to my door... LOVE AMAZON, AND ESSENTIA
customer_reviews.author: Songpeddlar

customer_reviews.title: YOU WON’T BE DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS WATER! however it can be hard to find it at a good price and in the size and quantity that I want. I have found it in this case! Great price, quick and quality shipping, everything in good condition (not always the case when something heavy like water is being packaged/shipped!) Very Satisfied – and this is my third re-order!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of the higher ph waters and this was not one of the better ones. The taste is not very good.
customer_reviews.author: TomG

customer_reviews.title: Small but still good.
customer_reviews.text: Small but still good. Easy to travel with and good for kids but the 1L is better bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Delace K.

customer_reviews.title: Price Gauging
customer_reviews.text: You can buy 24, 20-oz bottles for less than these 12, 12oz bottles. I typically order the case of 24, which has always been around $27 - I clearly need to pay closer attention - was extremely surprised to see only 12 bottles when my package arrived today, which cost over $28...and cannot even be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Zach T

customer_reviews.title: This is the best alkaline water I have tried.
customer_reviews.text: Not all alkaline waters are what they advertise. So far, this is the best one that I have tried. It has helped me with acid reflux and when my stomach is upset. You can't go wrong with giving this a try vs. medication.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Honeycutt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Of good quality thank you! Love the taste of this water very light.
customer_reviews.author: 954clive04

customer_reviews.title: Good Taste
customer_reviews.text: This Water has good flavor and is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: JHenson

customer_reviews.title: Not my cup of water ;(
customer_reviews.text: I just didn’t like the taste. I did like the handy bottles
customer_reviews.author: Viceroy

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves essentia
customer_reviews.text: This water is very refreshing and hydrating I purchase it all the time I really keep it on hand during the summer months
customer_reviews.author: Tamika T

customer_reviews.title: It's water
customer_reviews.text: It's water...no different taste from other bottled waters, at least to me. I like the Icelandic brand much better.
customer_reviews.author: her

customer_reviews.title: The Absolutely Best Water!
customer_reviews.text: I tested this and it delivered the alkaline pH it claims. It also tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great High PH Water
customer_reviews.text: Great high PH water! No mineral taste if that bothers you like it does to some in my house. Perfect sized bottles!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Eno

customer_reviews.title: Essentia Water
customer_reviews.text: Essentia Water good product, 20 oz. a lot better value , not sure why the 12 oz. bottles are so much more expensive , won't be buying again
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: It’s water
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Can’t find this size in the store. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Gardner Jr.

customer_reviews.title: busted bottles
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 12 pk. The box was busted and 3 bottles was busted
customer_reviews.author: vera

customer_reviews.title: 1st test not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I did a ph test and it came back 7.5. Havent tried again. So I added some alkalife to the water to make it more alkaline.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go-to water
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to water, but I prefer the larger bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie B. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Not worth price
customer_reviews.text: Worst buy yet. Love the water but the price is way too high. Thought this order had more bottles than were delivered. Could have purchased double this amount at our local grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Terry C Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is THE best water. Very good for workouts and daily hydration.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Priced Hike from $10 to $24
customer_reviews.text: I like the water and the size of the bottles are convenient. Would buy more if the price had not increased by nearly $15 from $10 to $24 immediately after I originally ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Felecia Williams

customer_reviews.text: Liked the water and how it's produced, a little pricey but, how much would you pay for better health.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B

customer_reviews.title: Glad I did It!
customer_reviews.text: Glad I subscribed, this was my first time setting up a subscription. You cannot beat the price in any store.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: First time
customer_reviews.text: I usually like this product but it's was empty into a box... Water bottles have different water levels in the bottles and sides of the bottle is soft but I will still keep the product just not reodering this.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ivey

customer_reviews.title: Small enough to throw in backpack or purse
customer_reviews.text: Came neatly packaged and I’m a timely manner. I’m so excited that I found these smaller ones that I can just put in my backpack or purse when I’m on the go. I will be ordering more in the near future
customer_reviews.author: Subrinamarie Powell

customer_reviews.title: Got superpowers after one sip
customer_reviews.text: These 12 packs really don't care about the bags of air used to insulate during shipping. Water taste fine. Better then average bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Ann T.

customer_reviews.title: Thirst Quenching
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty. You can definitely taste the difference between this water and other bottled brands.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Nina

customer_reviews.title: Grwat
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor. I don’t like water but have been drinking this constantly
customer_reviews.author: Mindie

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, not worth it. $25 for ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy, not worth it. $25 for 12 9oz, they’re tiny. You can get 16oz or 30oz for same price.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Feel energized, excellent with tea or just mixing with lime/lemon juice!
customer_reviews.text: Drink this product during the day and evenings when feeling dehydrated. Enjoy the taste feel energized !
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Threadgill

customer_reviews.title: I love this water
customer_reviews.text: I love this water!!!! Every since I have been drinking this water my body has a good PH balance.
customer_reviews.author: Zakiya Kangethe

product_meta.title: Essentia Water, 12-oz Bottles; Ionized Alkaline Bottled Water; 99.9% Pure; 9.5 pH or Higher; Consistent Quality in Every BPA and Phthalate-Free Bottle
feature_bullets: Essentia Water is created with 99.9% pure composition that meets EPA, FDA and IBWA standards for purified drinking water
To improve taste, Essentia adds a perfect blend of pure alkaline electrolytes in trace amounts that complement the body's natural mix
Drink up more of life with ionized hydration. Each bottle of Essentia Water has a pH of 9.5 or higher

12-ounce bottles of Essentia make a great addition to a sack lunch, a cooler for tailgates or block parties, gift and picnic baskets, training packs, and duffel bags headed to beach, practice or campout
Musicians, athletes, trainers, artists, students, and adventurers share the value of overachievement with Essentia Water; Essentia is The Future of Water
